verses.roman:
eta saba karma āmi ye-dehe karimu
tāhā chāḍite cāha tumi, kemane sahimu?"

synonyms: eta saba—all this; karma—work; āmi—I; ye-dehe—by which body; karimu—will do; tāhā—that; chāḍite—to give up; cāha tumi—you want; kemane—how; sahimu—shall I tolerate.
translation: "I have to do all this work through your body, but you want to give it up. How can I tolerate this?"
